name: Artifacto
description:
Welcome adventurer.

Do you want to embark on a search for artifacts hidden in vast dungeons filled with dangerous traps and clever enemies? 

In, Artifacto you can do just that.

Features:

  • Explore procedurally generated dungeons
  • Plan your way through them to avoid traps
  • Collect coins to upgrade you character...
  • And buy helpful items
  • Be careful of enemies: knights, ghosts and... cats

Will you be able to find all of the hidden artifacts?
